About Resurgence Labs

Resurgence Labs is a team of experienced engineers, researchers, and developers with a combined experience in the field spanning over 40 years. With projects in AI, Blockchain Technology, Web 5, and Cryptography, Resurgence Labs continues to keep itself up-to-date with the most modern technology, and has positioned itself well to implement efficiently, effectively, and ethically the technologies of tomorrow.

In the field of AI Agents, Resurgence Labs, being dedicated to creating user-friendly and intuitive AI Agents commenced the development of a SaaS based decentralized application that is lightweight and secure. Bob AI does NOT save client data on its servers, and only keeps track of the user preferences as cache on the user end, and does not require sensitive data like the user's private key or phrase to function. Our mission is to deliver robust, scalable, and user-friendly AI Agents for everyone in the Boba Ecosystem: small teams, budding startups, multimillion valuation entreprises, and Governments.
